discussion.details: Sai is currently interning at Snap Homes, working on an AI search project.
Sai is developing a chatbot from scratch, focusing on AI search functionalities.
Sai has designed a system with four different agents and created templates for common questions.
The AI is currently not equipped to handle questions outside the predefined templates.

insights.1: Sai is engaged in a hands-on project that involves building AI-driven solutions, which is a valuable experience for his career.
insights.2: The project focuses on creating a chatbot, indicating a trend towards conversational AI in the industry.
insights.3: The reliance on templates for responses suggests a need for further development in natural language understanding capabilities.
insights.4: There may be an opportunity to enhance the AI's ability to respond to a wider range of user inquiries, which could improve user experience.
